io-extras.name: io-extras
io-extras.description: Promise based methods for performing IO requests.

classitems.description: Method for initiating an ajax call.
classitems.name: xhr

props.name: method
props.description: HTTP method verb (e.g., GET or POST).

props.name: data
props.description:
This is the name-value string that will be
    sent as the transaction data. If the request is HTTP GET, the data become
    part of querystring. If HTTP POST, the data are sent in the message body.

props.name: form
props.description:
Form serialization configuration object. Its properties
    are:
    * `id` node object or id of HTML form
    * `useDisabled` true to also serialize disabled form field values (defaults
        to false)

props.name: headers
props.description:
Object map of transaction headers to send to
    the server. The object keys are the header names and the values are the
    header values.

props.name: timeout
props.description:
Millisecond threshold for the transaction
    before being automatically aborted.

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description: Initiaites an AJAX call with the HTTP method GET.
classitems.name: get

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description: Initiaites an AJAX call with the HTTP method POST.
classitems.name: post

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description: Initiaites an AJAX call with the HTTP method PUT.
classitems.name: put

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description: Initiaites an AJAX call with the HTTP method DELETE.
classitems.name: delete

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description: Alias for Y.io.delete()
classitems.name: DELETE

classitems.description:
Initiaites an AJAX call with the HTTP method POST and sends the data contained
in the specified form element.
classitems.name: postForm

params.name: selector
params.description:
CSS selector or Y.Node instance pointing to a form
    element.

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description: Inserts one or more scripts tags.
classitems.name: script

params.name: uri
params.description: Path or array of paths to the scripts.

return.description: Promise for the response object.

classitems.description: Inserts one or more CSS files into the page.
classitems.name: css

params.name: uri
params.description: Path or array of paths to the CSS files.

return.description: Promise for the response object.

classitems.description: Performs a JSONP request. Requires the JSONP module.
classitems.name: jsonp

params.name: uri
params.description:
The url of the JSONP service with the {callback}
    placeholder where the callback function name typically goes

props.name: timeout
props.description:
Millisecond threshold for the transaction
    before being automatically aborted

props.name: format
props.description:
Preprocessor function to stitch together
    the supplied URL (first argument), the proxy function name (internally
    generated), and any additional arguments passed to JSONPRequest#send()

return.description: Promise for the response object.

classitems.description:
Performs an AJAX request and parses the response as JSON notation.
Requires the JSON module.
classitems.name: json

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description:
Performs an AJAX request with the GET HTTP method and parses the response as
JSON notation. Requires the JSON module.
classitems.name: getJSON

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description:
Performs an AJAX request with the POST HTTP method and parses the response as
JSON notation. Requires the JSON module.
classitems.name: postJSON

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description:
Performs an AJAX request with the PUT HTTP method and parses the response as
JSON notation. Requires the JSON module.
classitems.name: putJSON

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.

classitems.description:
Performs an AJAX request with the DELETE HTTP method and parses the response as
JSON notation. Requires the JSON module.
classitems.name: deleteJSON

return.description:
Promise for the response object. Contains an extra
    `abort()` method to cancel the request.
